020
021import net.tnemc.bungee.ProxyProvider;
022import net.tnemc.bungee.message.backlog.BacklogEntry;
023import net.tnemc.bungee.message.backlog.ConfigEntry;
024import net.tnemc.bungee.message.backlog.MessageData;
025import net.tnemc.bungee.message.handlers.BalanceMessageHandler;
026import net.tnemc.bungee.message.handlers.MessageMessageHandler;
027import net.tnemc.bungee.message.handlers.SyncAllMessageHandler;
028
029import java.io.ByteArrayInputStream;
030import java.io.DataInputStream;
031import java.util.HashMap;
032import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
033import java.util.Map;
034import java.util.UUID;
035
036/**
037 * Manages all Plugin Channel messages.
038 *
039 * @author creatorfromhell
040 * @since 0.1.2.0
041 */
042public class MessageManager {
043
044  private static MessageManager instance;
045  private final Map<String, MessageHandler> handlers = new HashMap<>();
046  private final Map<String, MessageData> data = new LinkedHashMap<>();
047  private final Map<String, ConfigEntry> hubs = new HashMap<>();
048  private final ProxyProvider proxy;
049
050  public MessageManager(final ProxyProvider proxy) {
051
052    instance = this;
053    this.proxy = proxy;
054    handlers.put("balance", new BalanceMessageHandler());
055    //handlers.put("config", new ConfigMessageHandler());
056    handlers.put("sync", new SyncAllMessageHandler());
057    handlers.put("message", new MessageMessageHandler());
058  }
059
060  public static MessageManager instance() {
061
062    return instance;
063  }
064
065  public void onMessage(final String channel, final byte[] data) {
066
067    final String tag = channel.replace("tne:", "").split(" ")[0];
068
069
070    if(handlers.containsKey(tag)) {
071      try {
072
073        final MessageHandler handler = handlers.get(tag);
074
075        final ByteArrayInputStream stream = new ByteArrayInputStream(data);
076        final DataInputStream in = new DataInputStream(stream);
077
078        final UUID server = UUID.fromString(in.readUTF());
079        handler.handle(server, in);
080
081        in.close();
082        stream.close();
083      } catch(final Exception e) {
084        e.printStackTrace();
085      }
086    }
087  }
088
089  public ProxyProvider proxy() {
090
091    return proxy;
092  }
093
094  public Map<String, ConfigEntry> getHubs() {
095
096    return hubs;
097  }
098
099  public void backlog(final String server) {
100
101    if(data.containsKey(server)) {
102      proxy.sendBacklog(data.get(server));
103      data.remove(server);
104    }
105  }
106
107  public void addData(final String server, final BacklogEntry entry) {
108
109    if(data.containsKey(server)) {
110      data.get(server).getBacklog().add(entry);
111      return;
112    }
113
114    final MessageData data = new MessageData(server);
115    data.getBacklog().add(entry);
116    this.data.put(server, data);
117  }
118}
